name: Vermouth Cocktail
description: The Vermouth Cocktail illustrates the flavorful beauty of good vermouth, with just a little adornment. If you're prone to dismiss this drink out of hand because it's based on vermouth, then you're denying yourself the opportunity to see what the original fuss from the nineteenth century was all about.
recipeIngredient: 2 dashes maraschino liqueur (or curacao or Grand Marnier)
Twist of lemon peel, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink and use as garnish.
